text: Jeremy Adduono (born August 4, 1978, in Thunder Bay, Ontario, Canada) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey winger. He was drafted in the seventh round, 184th overall, by the Buffalo Sabres in the 1997 NHL Entry Draft. ==References== * Category:1978 births Category:Bridgeport Sound Tigers players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Living people Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Rochester Americans players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:United States Hockey League players
title: Jeremy Adduono
